name: language-client-example
description: VSCode part of a language server
author: Microsoft Corporation

cquery.whitelist.description:
Every EMCAScript regex in this list must match the translation unit's absolute path for it to get indexed. An empty list is interpreted as matching everything.

You probably want to begin the regex using `.*` because the passed paths are absolute.

cquery.blacklist.description:
A translation unit (cc/cpp file) is not indexed if any of the EMCAScript regexes in this list matches translation unit's the absolute path.

You probably want to begin the regex using `.*` because the passed paths are absolute.
